snippet: Defenseman Marc Staal and center Dominic Moore are approaching the season from dramatically different perspectives of redemption.
abstract: New York Rangers defenseman Marc Staal and center Dominic Moore are approaching the season from dramatically different perspectives of redemption; for Staal, challenge is physical, recovering from a serious eye injury sustained last season after a concussion-shortened 2011-2012 season; for Moore, challenge is emotional, skipping all of last season after his wife Katie died in January 2012 from liver cancer.
lead_paragraph: Defenseman Marc Staal and center Dominic Moore are approaching the season from dramatically different perspectives of redemption.

headline.main: Returning to Rangers After Injury, and Loss
headline.print_headline: Returning To Rangers After Injury, And Loss
